episodes_names: Tell us, Wizard King! How Can We Become the Wizard King?!
The Star on the Shooting Star
We Need to Stack Up Merit Like a Mille-feuille, La... Falalalala, Lalalala!

A Sudden Battle with the Demon (Lies)
